author: cms-sw
body:
* Updated py3-awkward (0 and 1) to latest versions
* Updated py3-uproot (3 and 4) to latest versions

Question: can we drop py3-awkward0 and py3-uproot3? Keeping them was requested in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/6119, @ianna can you comment?
title: Update awkward and uproot
